sentence.Network_en: My mother has become very forgetful and confused recently.
sentence.Network_cn: 我妈妈近来变得非常健忘，糊里糊涂。

sentence.Network_en: She has become very forgetful in recent years.
sentence.Network_cn: 近年来她变得十分健忘。

sentence.Network_en: Grandfather is forgetful and often repeats himself when he tells a story.
sentence.Network_cn: 祖父很健忘,他讲故事时常重复.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 形容人性格的词汇 ... forceful （性格）坚强的 forgetful 健忘的 friendly 友好的.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... forever ad. 永远；永恒的 forgetful a. 健忘的，不留心的 fork n. 叉，餐叉.
描述性格的英语单词汇总_百度文库 ... patient 耐心 forgetful 健忘 boring 乏味.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... fearful 可怕的 forgetful 易忘的 truthful 真实的.

list.abs: 八年级上册英语语法复习全册 ... stop doing sth 停止做某事 forget doing sth 忘记做过某事 go on doing sth 继续做某事.
欧品乐 - OpinLe ... 密码 password 忘记密码 forget password 下次登录 remember me.
晓美焰_百度百科 ... you are not alone. 你就不是孤身一人 Don't forget 不要忘记 Always. somewhere. 在某个角落始终.
英语中不能直译的句子_小颖_新浪博客 ... We'll see. 再说吧。 Forget it. 算了吧。 Take care. 请多保重。.

entry.def: Someone who is forgetful often forgets things.

example.ex: My mother has become very forgetful and confused recently.
example.tran: 我妈妈近来变得非常健忘，糊里糊涂。

sentences.sentence: "while thus unmindful of his steps he stumbled"- G.B.Shaw

auth_sentence.content: She also often seemed more forgetful and could ramble when she spoke.
auth_sentence.res_content: She also often seemed more forgetful and could ramble when she spoke.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She also often seemed more forgetful and could ramble when she spoke.

auth_sentence.content: This makes sleep disturbed and restless, and can leave people tired, irritable, forgetful and depressed.
auth_sentence.res_content: This makes sleep disturbed and restless, and can leave people tired, irritable, forgetful and depressed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This makes sleep disturbed and restless, and can leave people tired, irritable, forgetful and depressed.

auth_sentence.content: Her daughter, Castelle Davis, said: They kept telling me she had dementia because she was forgetful and hallucinating.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her daughter, Castelle Davis, said: They kept telling me she had dementia because she was forgetful and hallucinating.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her daughter, Castelle Davis, said: They kept telling me she had dementia because she was forgetful and hallucinating.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"有……的;充满……的"; 2. 表名词,"满,量"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bane毒药,祸害+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.有害的,致祸的
cheer愉快,欢呼+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.愉快的,高兴的
faith信任,信念+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.守信的,忠实的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的
stems_affixes.word_buile: forget忘记+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fruit果实+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
grace优美+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.优美的
grate=grat感激+ful多……的→adj.[to,for]感激的;感谢的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人希望的,抱有希望的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.给人希望的,抱有希望的
power力量+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.强大的,有力的
rue悔恨+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.后悔的,遗憾的
shame耻辱+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.可耻的;不道德的
success成功,胜利+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.成功的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
stems_affixes.word_buile: thought思考,想法+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
will意志+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.任性的,故意的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wonder奇迹+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
hand手+ful满,量→n.一把;少数;一小撮

sentences.en: Every actor ought to know his lines backwards before he goes on stage,as nervousness may make him forgetful.
sentences.cn: 所有演员在上台前都应当把台词记得滚瓜烂熟,因为一紧张就容易忘词。

sentences.en: Grandfather is forgetful and often repeats himself when he tells a story.
sentences.cn: 祖父很健忘,他讲故事时常重复。
